title: Perfect
text: Perfect transaction. I have ordered from her several times and she always adds a personal touch which is so nice and rare these days!! Will continue to buy from her ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è wish I could give 10 stars!

title: Log in
text: Won‚Äôt let me log back into the app! It kicked me out and even though I Sign in with Apple, it just doesn‚Äôt understand. But I could log in perfectly to the website, make it make sense.

title: Disappointed in Vinted Consumers
text: This seems more like a continuation of Pinterest and less like a real selling site.  I have lots of ‚Äúconsumers‚Äù favoriting items and much of the feedback is that they like the item and just want to save it to their closet virtually but have no intention of buying.  I have decreased my items as a result and items that languish here on Vinted sell witching a couple weeks on sites like eBay and to a lesser extent on Mercari and Bonanza.

title: Rules on this selling site
text: The rules do not Apple to all the same! When reported to administration it is overlooked and still selling when it is obvious they are running a business that is not allowed on this site. It is totally unfair.

title: it‚Äôs ok
text: I love this app but the app itself has such problems! Half the time I cannot purchase / get to a purchase screen and when reaching out to their customer service I was told ‚ÄúI hope you can buy it!‚Äù Instead of helping or fixing their very clear on going bugs. AWFUL Customer support. If the bugs and customer service got fixed this would be 5 stars.

title: Policy
text:
I‚Äôm not happy with my last purchase
The person sells an item as brand new with a tag, but one sandal has a big stain in the back and obviously the seller was aware of it because she didn‚Äôt post a picture of the stain on purpose

Vinted should change policy or back up its policy if there is one in place stating that even if an item has a new tittle and tags attached, but is stain or damage, the buyer should have the right to know that by pictures or stating it on the description

Also, That it should be the sellers responsibility to disclosed any stain or damage on any brand new item and that if seller doesn‚Äôt disclosed such stain / damage,  that the buyer has the right for a free return at the sellers expenses

title: Scammers
text: I was scammed, I didn‚Äôt know how are you paid when you sell something, I tried to find in app but there was no information, so when I received email asking my card number because my item was sold, and girl who bought it was talking to me in app, I thought this is how you receive money and I entered information, I was charged several times, thanks god I called bank right away and canceled transactions. Be careful, I deleted app

title: I loved it!
text: The items I received were in excellent condition when they arrived. The shipping itself was really quick. I loved the packaging and the little gift included! I will definitely buy from her again!

title: Not sure what to say
text: On old vinted i sold a lot of stuff. If i relied on vinted for income over the last year, i would have starved to death.  Service fees and postage are killing this once unique platform. I dont pretend to know what the answer is. One suggestion is that item that arent sold within a month or two fall off. The seller can relist. I see the same things on this site month after month.

title: 4 stars
text: Made my first sale. The app is smooth but slow. I don‚Äôt know why it took some hours to process the shipping label. The app is definitely seller friendly, but there‚Äôs some features I need to get used ( /I don‚Äôt like) to though overall it‚Äôs pretty easy to use.

title: Idk why I ever stopped using this!
text: THE BEST SELLING APP! Cheaper shipping than the rest AND NO SELLING FEE!!!! Only issue is other apps are more popular so they have ALOT but other places have much more. Still 5 stars! Also have a bundle buttons some apps don‚Äôt offer that either

title: No Resellers Allowed
text: If you are a reseller don‚Äôt even think about using this app. They will delete your items and possibly suspend your account if they think you are selling ‚Äúcommercial ‚Äú goods for a profit. Total nonsense. Aren‚Äôt we all trying to make a profit? I honestly don‚Äôt even know how they are making money, unless it‚Äôs off new users or selling our information. If I could give them negative stars I would. Don‚Äôt waste your time with this app.

title: Best app for selling and buying
text: I love how it‚Äôs not as expensive as Poshmark, and it‚Äôs just so overrated. Vinted really gives you a window to nice sellers, can fix your problem and it‚Äôs trustworthy üëåüèº. You will not regret using this app! Really it‚Äôs the first app I give an actual review üê£

title: Hi Vinted
text: Dez1luv saying thank you for all the years with me. In appreciate the business and understand the platform change. Change is good and I‚Äôm glad you‚Äôre still here making it happen for a full time momma like me:)

title: Smelled of smoke
text: My clothes arrived smelling of smoke. There were 2 dryer sheets in the box attempting to decrease the smell but still obvious. I take part of the blame for not asking if the items came from a smoke free home. However, I feel it should be included in the description if it comes from a smokers home. That‚Äôs why Vinted gets 4 stars.

title: Not bad.
text:
I can‚Äôt figure out how to contact anyone from your team directly. 

I think it‚Äôs really silly that Moby wrap carriers can‚Äôt be sold due to being a ‚Äúhealth risk‚Äù when they are machine washable. I don‚Äôt feel like wrap fabric is anymore of a health risk than baby clothes. 

I feel like the glitches are improving, but I still get notifications for messages I can‚Äôt see for sometimes hours. 

I love your setup for sending the postsble label so easily. I feel this app is quite user friendly and easy to navigate.

title: Useless App
text: Customer service is terrible its honestly shocking how bad it is. I kept getting my items taken down even after I explained that I‚Äôm not violating the rule that they said I was (which is something very easily proven if they bothered to check themselves). I would contact them throughout the app & they would close the case every time even though a resolution was never reached & they never helped me figure out how to post the item.

title: I absolutely LOVE my blouses
text: I am so excited about my new blouses! I absolutely love them! Thank you so very much for posting and wheeling and dealing with me! I can‚Äôt wait until you go through your closet again! Until next time‚Ä¶. Stay safe!

title: I love this app
text: Normally stores charge you at least five dollars for shipping the storage charges you $.99 for shipping and everything comes super fast if you don‚Äôt have this app you really need to check it out!

title: They steal your money and they are racist.
text: I have sold a few items on this app and first they didnt allow me to withdraw the balance to my bank account saying i need identity verification then later i couldnt even get the money i got from selling items to people from pending to available balance on the app itself. I saw many comments on instagram stating the same issue abd all say the same thing. Help center is useless abd this is outrageous.

title: Not working
text:
I‚Äôve bought and sold a couple of things and I wanted to start selling a bunch of stuff I‚Äôve got and I don‚Äôt use/need anymore.
Anyways, there‚Äôs a lot of obviously fake items being sold on the app, but just about half an hour ago I tried to sell an ORIGINAL Swarovski x Sanrio piece, it was put under revision and now I can‚Äôt open the app anymore. I think my account got locked or something and it makes no sense at all.

title: GARBAGE
text: almost every single purchase i made comes defective and people lie about the conditions of their items. Vinted charges ‚Äúbuyer protection‚Äù but will make you pay for return shipping and the customer support is non existent. I purchased an item on the 28th of last month its now the 10th of the next month. They keep telling me ‚Äúwait 24 hours‚Äù even though the seller is over the 10 day shipping mark. Please guys, this app isnt worth it. Stick to poshmark, curtsy, and depop.

title: Excellent
text:
Everything came in excellent condition! I am more than happy with my purchase. 
Great customer service helped me 100% walked me through everything step by step. Extremely please. Thank you so much.

title: App
text: The app is horrible use to b great and now nothing but problems it always says I have a notification when I don‚Äôt I always freezing up or not working deleting my app

title: Order suspended
text: I‚Äôm writing this review with one star hoping Vinted or sara9832 will take action on my order that had the wrong item sent. The seller has made no attempt to contact me, though I have submitted pictures and reason to make this situation right. Vinted will only take action if I agree to pay for the postage to return the one item. After today I will delete the App and have this sad story to share if anyone asks.

title: What the heck, Vinted?
text: Made an account, listed a few items that followed their rules, just a few used clothing items, not things that aren‚Äôt allowed. No stock pictures nothing like that. Next day I try to add more and it says my account has been banned for fraudulent financial activity? I‚Äôve done 0 financial activity? Reached out to Vinted customer support through various methods over a span of a few months and never once got a response.

title: Annoyed & frustrated
text: I have been selling on this app for years now and suddenly received a very threatening email regarding ‚Äòcopyright‚Äô and ‚Äòcommercial use‚Äô. We‚Äôre just people trying to make some money, I don‚Äôt understand the hostility. It‚Äôs hard enough to even make a sale on the app and this has made that even worse. There‚Äôs plenty of apps out there to sell nowadays, I suggest for people to look to those instead.

title: Fresh and clean!
text: This seller was easy to work with, prompt with shipping time, AND my beautiful dress arrived smelling like my favorite laundry detergent (it‚Äôs the little things!) thank you so much!! 100% would buy from this seller again.

title: Absolutely horrible.
text:
Customer support is non existent. A buyer canceled after I shipped a product out and she canceled it after delivery and she got a full refund and my product I shipped free. 
I contacted support twice and they never replied. So unless you want to give away the things you list for free. Don‚Äôt use this app to sell. 

If you‚Äôre looking to get free stuff I guess you can do what the buyer did to me!

title: Cart and Filter option for Favorites
text: Please make it an option to put items in a cart and be able to filter out our favorites so we don‚Äôt have to scroll down for years to find stuff!

title: Account blocked on false claims
text: My account was blocked without notice Sox days after I opened it because they claimed the only item (sweater) I listed was not authentic. I uploaded pictures of the overall product, close-in picture of the logo, close-in picture of the tag on the neck but they still claimed it was not authentic and wanted to see receipts from the original purchase - which happened three years ago.

title: Customer Service is a Joke.
text: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE platform to sell on. The Customer Service Representatives could care less about you. Packages are ALWAYS being canceled, if you ever have an issue the representatives will just repeatedly ask you to wait and eventually tell you to handle the situation yourself. You could ask multiple questions and they will not reply to any of them. Do not bother on this app it is a waste of time.

title: Customer service issues
text: Hard to find personalized customer service. I wanna call or interact with an actual person because my problem is not in the frequent questions.

title: no longer affordable
text: Vinted recently DOUBLED their shipping costs and now it is no longer affordable to purchase on this app and i am no longer making any sales. it used to be 3.99 for a small parcel and now it is 6.92!!!! there is no way to lower the shipping amount yourself so many are resorting to switching to different apps completely. This is ridiculous and i am really hoping they will change it back.

title: Shipping label failing = can't sell
text: Used to be a good app but a couple months ago, people will buy from you and once you have to generate the shipping label, it'll fail and never let you ship your item out. Lost many sales because of this. I can't sell anything due to the failed labels and no help from customer support for weeks. Many others are also experiencing the same problem. Deleting the app

title: i‚Äôve never had an issue!
text: idk why the reviews are so bad, i actually really like this app, especially as a seller!! there‚Äôs no selling fee, there‚Äôs options to bundle and to create bundle discounts! there‚Äôs just a few bugs and minor flaws, but i really like it over all. yes, it is a little discomforting when they ask for your social, but it‚Äôs just to verify your identity to protect others from being scammed. other than that, i really don‚Äôt have anything bad to say :)

title: Super Buggy!
text: I just started using Vinted so I can‚Äôt speak to any of their big systematic changes but I do like selling with them! The app is just very buggy - I have to hit buttons repeatedly to get them to do anything. Sometimes they just don‚Äôt work at all. If these issues were fixed I‚Äôd give it 5 stars.

title: So Professional! ü•∞
text: The whole process was smooth and I received quality service. Authentic pieces and will definitely purchase from her again!‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Please fix bugs!
text: Great app but when I am typing in the description of something I want to sell the app is suddenly very slow and I can barely type

title: Overall the worst selling app
text: I have too many complaints about Vinted to list them all. Customer service is incompetent at best, spiteful jerks at worst. Now their app doesn‚Äôt even function. Since their latest update, I‚Äôm no longer able to sign in on my phone and can only access my account through a computer. No point in contacting them about it though because they resolve nothing.

title: Poor Support and App has showstopping bugs
text: I opened the account, but the app would not let me set my country to Canada, as it is not in the drop down selections.   I selected United States instead and the app changed my country to France.  I tried to make a purchase, but it was declined for using a Canadian card.   Support took over a week to get back to me after 3 form/bot emails, only to tell me it‚Äôs an issue and they don‚Äôt intend to fix it.

title: Bad Service
text: I bought one item from here. I wouldn‚Äôt have cause they charge an outrageous amount of fees but the seller didn‚Äôt budge and choose this route. I tried selling one pair on here and was instantly blocked for not having 20 pictures of the shoes but the shoes I purchased didn‚Äôt have so many pictures. After reading the other reviews on here I decided to delete the app and stick to OfferUp EBay and Grailed. What a joke MAKE IT MAKE SENSE

title: Great app but
text: It‚Äôd be nice if we could use filters when bundling. I don‚Äôt want to scroll through thousands of various items on someone‚Äôs shop to select a few tank tops

title: I love them
text: Thank you so much for the gift, I love it ü•∞ I like the way that you packed the items and all the details. I‚Äôm happy to make business with you! Blessings for you and your family üôèüèª

title: Horrible customer support
text: They allow any buyers to cancel transactions and expect you to refund the item.  Regardless of picture and description accuracy. When you send in more pictures of the item they claim it‚Äôs edited (when it‚Äôs not) They completely ignore all the good reviews you already have. No point in selling on here, only buying apparently so you can get free stuff.

title: Be careful!
text: Be careful and be mindful of the seller you‚Äôre buying from. About half of my packages never came, and you only have two days to report an issue. So if you‚Äôre leaving or out of town, get someone to check your delivery. Other than that, it‚Äôs easy and fine.

title: Wonderful!!!
text: The entire transaction was perfect. Communication was great. Very prompt delivery. Great clothes. She was even so courteous to ship a dollar with my package bc she missed telling me about a tiny stain on the skirt I got for my daughter. Very nice. Thank you so much!

title: Useless
text:
I used to use vinted (back then it was Kleiderkreisel) ... Used to be super easy to sell stuff on there without any complaints. 

So I made a Profil again.
Uploaded my items on my profile (leggings, jeans, sneaker ) and the next Morning I woke up to my profile being deleted for guide line violations for selling my items???? It makes no sense. I'm using my own photos and not some
Internet Pictures from someone else. There's no option to put dispute to fix the issue. 
Then I tried to make a new profile because I couldn't log into my old one anymore obviously and it got deleted before I even got the chance to start selling my stuff. Not recommending this website at all.

title: Too many problems.
text: Vinted works until there are problems with the sales. For example, people too often send the wrong sizes. Vinted gives you little time to return before they finalize the sales. Middle of the week, not exception. They expect you to leave work and ship products back while paying for shipping. Time to look for a better alternative

title: Amazing Shoes and as described.
text:
Thanks a lot for taking care of the parcel and I am loving the shoes. 
I have the same one in black and I love now my new colour! 
The seller has been very helpful as this was the first time for me using Vinted.
Thanks a lot!
